HD44780_DESCRIPTION: HD44780 LCD display library for I2C.
HD44780_CONSTRUCTOR_MESSAGE0: create $[CONSTRUCTED_VAR_NAME] HD44780 LCD on I2C bus $[I2C_INSTANCE]
HD44780_CONSTRUCTOR_TOOLTIP: Create an HD44780 LCD instance on the specified I2C bus
HD44780_CLEAR_TOOLTIP: Clear the LCD display and return cursor to home position
HD44780_PRINT_TOOLTIP: Print text at the current cursor position on the LCD
HD44780_SETCURSOR_TOOLTIP: Set the cursor position on the LCD (top left = 0, 0)
HD44780_CURSOR_TOOLTIP: Set the cursor style to blinking block or underline
HD44780_CREATECHAR_TOOLTIP: Define a custom character (0â€“7) from an array of 8 bytes
